object.name: nAcd
object.description: TEST parameter

object.name: Gem_elapsed
object.description: TEST parameter

object.name: alltriggers
object.description: TEST parameter

object.name: CondSummaryWord_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of CondSummary Word values
object.description: Distribution of condsumary word values

object.name: CondArrTKRTrigger_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival TKR triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for TKR triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for TKR triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCalLowTrigger_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival Cal-Low triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for Cal-Low triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for Cal-Low triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCalHiTrigger_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival Cal-Hi triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for Cal-Hi triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for Cal-Hi triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCNOTrigger_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival CNO triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for CNO triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for CNO triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrROITrigger_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival ROI triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for ROI triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for ROI triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: DiscardedDelta_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of GEM discarded events between two successive read out events.
object.description: Number of GEM discarded events between two successive read out events. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: DeadZoneDelta_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of GEM deadzone events between two successive read out events.
object.description: Number of GEM deadzone events between two successive read out events. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: Trigger_TKR_Histo1
object.description: Tkracker trigger rate (3 bilayers in a row)

object.name: Trigger_CALLO
object.description: CAL-LO trigger rate

object.name: Trigger_CALHI
object.description: CAL-HI trigger rate

object.name: Trigger_CNO
object.description: CNO trigger rate

object.name: Trigger_TRK_And_ROI
object.description: TKR trigger and ROI (mostly charge particles)

object.name: Trigger_TRK_And_NotROI
object.description: TKR trigger and not ROI (mostly non charge particles) rate

object.name: Trigger_Periodic
object.description: Periodic trigger rate

object.name: Trigger_NOTPeriodic
object.description: Rate of events with NOT periodic trigger

object.name: CondsummaryBitAnd30_NOTPeriodic_Counter
object.description: Counter of events with condsummaryBitAnd30 AND NotcondsummaryBitAnd32)

object.name: Trigger_Solicited
object.description: Solicited trigger rate

object.name: Trigger_External
object.description: External trigger rate

object.name: Trigger_ANY
object.description: Rate of any of the trigger bits in condsummary word

object.name: Trigger_ANYPhysics
object.description: Rate of any non-artificially created trigger (i.e. bits [1-4]) in condsummary word

object.name: TkrTrigger_Rate_Tower[16]
object.description: Rate of tracker triggers in [tower], calculated during the specified time bin

object.name: TkrTrigger_Counter_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of tracker triggers in [tower], calculated during the specified time bin

object.name: TkrTrigger_Tower_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of tracker triggers per tower
object.description: Number of tracker triggers per tower

object.name: CalHiTrigger_Rate_Tower[16]
object.description: Rate of Cal HI triggers in [tower], calculated during the specified time bin

object.name: CalHiTrigger_Counter_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of Cal HI triggers in [tower], calculated during the specified time bin

object.name: CalHiTrigger_Tower_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of Cal HI triggers per tower
object.description: Number of Cal HI triggers per tower

object.name: CalLOWTrigger_Rate_Tower[16]
object.description: Rate of Cal LOW triggers in [tower], calculated during the specified time bin

object.name: CalLOWTrigger_Counter_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of Cal LOW triggers in [tower], calculated during the specified time bin

object.name: CalLOWTrigger_Tower_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of Cal LOW triggers per tower
object.description: Number of Cal LOW triggers per tower

object.name: Livetime
object.description: Livetime (in the time bin) in 50 ns ticks

object.name: Elapsed
object.description: Elapsed time (in the time bin) in 50 ns ticks

object.name: DeadZone
object.description: Number of lost events because they arrived in the 2-tick deadzone during this time bin

object.name: Discarded
object.description: Number of discarded events because they arrived in deadtime during this time bin

object.name: Prescaled
object.description: Number of events prescaled away (in hardware) in this time bin

object.name: Acd_GemVeto_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector [AcdTile] reporting the number of ACD GEM vetos during the specified time bin

object.name: Acd_GemVeto_AcdTile_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd Gem vetos by tile. Expect to see spikes at 15,31,47,63. These are the large tiles at the bottom of the sides of the ACD.
object.description: Number of Acd Gem vetos by tile. Expect to see spikes at 15,31,47,63. These are the large tiles at the bottom of the sides of the ACD.

object.name: Acd_GemVeto_Rate_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector [AcdTile] reporting the rate of ACD GEM vetos, computed during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdGemROI_Counter_Tower[16]
object.description: Vector [tower] reporting the number of ACD GEM ROI during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdGemROI_Rate_Tower[16]
object.description: Vector [tower] reporting the rate of ACD GEM ROI, computed during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdGemROI_Tower_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd ROI by tower. This bit is set if any of the tile in the ROI fired a veto. This bit is independent of if the Tower bit is set.
object.description: Number of Acd ROI by tower. This bit is set if any of the tile in the ROI fired a veto. This bit is independent of if the Tower bit is set.

object.name: AcdGemCNO_Counter_GARC[12]
object.description: Vector [GARC] reporting the number of ACD CNO triggers during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdGemCNO_Rate_GARC[12]
object.description: Vector [GARC] reporting the rate of ACD CNO triggers, computed during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdGemCNO_GARC_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd CNO by board. This bit is the OR of all the CNO signals on a single board. Because of the tile to board mapping, a factor two variation between boards is normal.
object.description: Number of Acd Cno by board. This bit is the OR of all the CNO signals on a single board. Because of the tile to board mapping, a factor two variation between boards is normal.

object.name: AcdHit_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector [AcdTile] reporting the number of ACD hits during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdHit_Rate_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector [AcdTile] reporting the rate of ACD hits, computed during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdDigis
object.description: Number of ACD Digis during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdDigis_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of ACD Digis per event
object.description: Distribution of ACD digis per event. This is just the total number of tiles that have at least one PMT above the zero suppression threshold.

object.name: AcdPmtA_OverThreshold_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that PMT A was above threshold during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdPmtB_OverThreshold_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that PMT B was above threshold during the specified time bin

object.name: SingleAcdPmt_OverThreshold_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that ONE (and only one) of the two PMTs (A OR B) was above threshold during the specified time bin

object.name: AnyAcdPmt_OverThreshold_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that at least one PMT was above threshold during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdVetoA_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that there was a veto from PMT A during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdVetoB_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that there was a veto from PMT B during the specified time bin

object.name: SingleAcdVeto_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that ONE (and only one) of the two PMTs produced a Veto during the specified time bin

object.name: AnyAcdVeto_Counter_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector[AcdTile] reporting the number of times that there was an ACD Veto (produced by one or by the two PMTs) during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdPha_PmtA_Mean_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector [AcdTile] reporting the mean pulse height from PMT A during the specified time bin

object.name: AcdPha_PmtB_Mean_AcdTile[128]
object.description: Vector [AcdTile] reporting the mean pulse height from PMT B during the specified time bin

object.name: TkrHits
object.description: Number of tkracker hits (all towers and planes included) in the specified time bin

object.name: TkrHits_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of strip hits per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of the number of strip hits per event (all towers included).

object.name: TkrHits_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of tracker hits in [tower] in the specified time bin

object.name: TkrHits_Histo1_Tower[16]
object.description: Distribution of the number of strip hits per tower.

object.name: TkrPlanesHit_Histo1_Tower[16]
object.description: Distribution of the number of planes hit in a tower.

object.name: TkrHits_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of tracker hits in [tower][tkrplane] in the specified time bin

object.name: TkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_Histo2
object.titledesc: Number of strip hits vs Tower and Tkr plane.
object.description: Number of strip hits vs Tower and Tkr plane.

object.name: TkrHitsWhenTkrDigiExists_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Mean number of tracker hits per event in [tower][tkrplane]. Only events which have a TkrDigi associated to that [tower][tkrplane] are used in the average procedure

object.name: ZeroTkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that there are ZERO strip hits in [tower][tkrplane] in the specified time bin

object.name: ZeroTkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_Histo2
object.titledesc: Counter for ZERO strip hits vs Tower and Tracker plane.
object.description: Counter for ZERO strip hits vs Tower and Tracker plane.

object.name: ZeroTkrHitsFraction_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that there are ZERO strip hits in [tower][tkrplane] in the specified time bin, normalized to the number of overall TkrDigis (all towers and trkplanes)

object.name: ZeroTkrHitsFractionV2_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that there are ZERO strip hits in [tower][tkrplane] in the specified time bin, normalized to the number of TkrDigis in that specific [tower][tkrplane]

object.name: TkrTriggerWithLessThan6Layers_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of times that, in [tower], there was a tracker trigger and the number of consecutive tracker planes hit is less than 6

object.name: ConsecutivePlanesHit_Tower[16]
object.description: Mean number of consecutive tracker planes hit in [tower] per event triggereing that [tower]

object.name: EmptyTowers_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of times [tower] did not trigger and was not close to a tower that triggered

object.name: HitsInEmptyTower_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of hits when the tower was empty

object.name: HitsInEmptyTower_Tower_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of hits when the tower was empty vs tower number
object.description: Number of hits when the tower was empty vs tower number

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects in each [tower][tkrplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_TowerPlane_Histo2
object.titledesc: Number of TkrDigi objects in each vs Tower and Tracker plane.
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects in each vs Tower and Tracker plane.

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_Tower[16]
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects in each [tower] during the specified time bin

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_Tower_Histo1
object.titledesc: Number of TkrDigi objects vs tower number
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects vs tower number.

object.name: TkrDigiCounter
object.description: Number of TkrDigis (all towers and planes included) accumulated in the specified time bin

object.name: TkrDigis_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of tracker Digis per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of the number of TkrDigis per event (all towers included).

object.name: ToT_con0_250_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that ToT==250 (saturation) in controller 0 in [tower][trkplane] in the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_con1_250_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that ToT==250 (saturation) in controller 1 in [tower][trkplane] in the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_250_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that ToT==250 in either controller 0 or controller 1 in [tower][trkplane] in the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_con0_0_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi, ToT==0 in controller 0 in [tower][trkplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_con1_0_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi, ToT==0 in controller 1 in [tower][trkplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_0_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_con0_Greater250_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that, ToT>250 (overlapped trigger) in controller 0 in [tower][trkplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_con1_Greater250_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that, ToT>250 (overlapped trigger) in controller 1 in [tower][trkplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_Greater250_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that, ToT>250 (overlapped trigger) either in controller 0 or controller 1 in [tower][trkplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_con0_TruncMean_1_249_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Truncated mean (only range [1,249] is used) ToT value per event in controller 0 in [tower][trkplane]

object.name: ToT_con1_TruncMean_1_249_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Truncated mean (only range [1,249] is used) ToT value per event in controller 1 in [tower][trkplane]

object.name: ToT_0_WhenTkrHitsExist_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi and having at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane] during the specified time bin

object.name: ToT_0_WhenTkrHitsExist_TowerPlane_Histo2
object.titledesc: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi and having at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane]
object.description: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi and having at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane]

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Rate_TowerCalLayerCalColumn[16][8][12]
object.description: Vector[tower][callayer][calcolumn] reporting the hit rate in a crystal defined by the coordinates tower,callayer,calcolumn. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Rate_TowerCalLayer[16][8]
object.description: Vector[tower][callayer] reporting the hit rate in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayerCalColumn[16][8][12]
object.description: Vector[tower][callayer][calcolumn] reporting the hit rate in a crystal defined by the coordinates tower,callayer,calcolumn. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer[16][8]
object.description: Vector[tower][callayer] reporting the hit rate in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_Histo2
object.titledesc: Number of hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Number of hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_ZEROHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer[16][8]
object.description: Vector[tower][callayer] reporting the number of ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_ZEROHit_Fraction_TowerCalLayer[16][8]
object.description: Fraction of events with ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account. The normalization factor used to compute the fraction is CondsummaryBitAnd30_NOTPeriodic_Counter

object.name: ZeroCalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_Histo2
object.titledesc: Number of times there is ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Number of times there is ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Mean_TowerCalLayer[16][8]
object.description: Vector[tower][callayer] reporting the MEAN number of hits (per event) in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer, computed with the events recorded in the specified time bin. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_IsHit_Rate_TowerCalLayer[16][8]
object.description: Vector[tower][callayer] reporting the rate at which the calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer has a hit. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalXHit_NTowerHit_Rate_Tower[16]
object.description: Vector[tower] reporting the rate of calorimeter crystal hits in that tower. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalX_NHit_Histo1_Tower[16]
object.axisdesc: [Number of CalX_Hits in this tower, N]
object.description: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event in this tower.

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Counter
object.description: Rate of calorimeter crystal hits (all towers, layers and columns). Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalX_NHit_Histo1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event (all towers included).

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Mean
object.description: MEAN number of calorimeter crystal hits per event (integrated over all towers, layers and columns), computed in the specified time bin. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
